title: Comparing the Effectiveness of Online vs. Face-to-Face Education: Blended Learning Strategies for Professional Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in online/in-person education and over 3 years of professional practical work
context.additional_context: Content design optimized for smartphone-based learning environments, including two in-person workshops.

learning_goals: Learners can compare the strengths and weaknesses of online/in-person education in terms of practical competency development
Participants can propose at least two strategies for improving networking and soft skills in blended learning environments
Participants can establish blended (face-to-face/online) integration strategies for designing job-applicable practice-centered learning activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
